perturbation.original_text: c.Except as expressly set forth in this Amendment and notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained in the JV Agreement (including Section 9.3.11 (Termination and Survival)), (a) effective as of the later of the VNBJ Closing and the VNBZ Closing, the JV Agreement shall terminate in its entirety with respect to the Veoneer Parties and (b) after the later of the VNBJ Closing and the VNBZ Closing, the Veoneer Parties shall cease to be a party to the JV Agreement and shall have no further obligations with respect thereto. For clarity, upon the later of the VNBJ Closing and the VNBZ Closing, the JV Agreement will remain in full force and effect in accordance with the terms thereof solely between the Nissin Parties and Autoliv AB with respect to the liquidation proceedings of ANRA.
perturbation.changed_text: c.Except as expressly set forth in this Amendment and notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained in the JV Agreement (including Section 9.3.11 (Termination and Survival)), (a) effective as of the later of the VNBJ Closing and the VNBZ Closing, the JV Agreement shall terminate in its entirety with respect to the Veoneer Parties, unless otherwise decided by the Nissin Parties. (b) after the later of the VNBJ Closing and the VNBZ Closing, the Veoneer Parties shall cease to be a party to the JV Agreement and shall have no further obligations with respect thereto, subject to the discretion of the Nissin Parties. For clarity, upon the later of the VNBJ Closing and the VNBZ Closing, the JV Agreement will remain in full force and effect in accordance with the terms thereof solely between the Nissin Parties and Autoliv AB with respect to the liquidation proceedings of ANRA.
perturbation.explanation: The original text stated that the JV Agreement would terminate in its entirety with respect to Veoneer Parties. The modified version introduces uncertainty by adding "unless otherwise decided by the Nissin Parties" and "subject to the discretion of the Nissin Parties". This contradicts the prior statement and creates uncertainty about whether the Veoneer Parties are actually released from the agreement, potentially leading to disputes.

perturbation.original_text: d.Notwithstanding Article 1.1, Article 1.2 and Article 1.3 above, the termination of the JV Agreement with respect to VNBJ, VNBZ or the Veoneer Parties shall not release any Veoneer Party or any Nissin Party from liability for the breach of any of its representations, warranties, covenants or agreements set forth in the JV Agreement that arise prior to the VNBJ Closing or the VNBZ Closing, as applicable.
perturbation.changed_text: d.Notwithstanding Article 1.1, Article 1.2 and Article 1.3 above, the termination of the JV Agreement with respect to VNBJ, VNBZ or the Veoneer Parties may release any Veoneer Party or any Nissin Party from liability for the breach of any of its representations, warranties, covenants or agreements set forth in the JV Agreement that arise prior to the VNBJ Closing or the VNBZ Closing, as applicable, depending on the circumstances.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly stated that termination does not release parties from liability for prior breaches. The modified version introduces the possibility of release ("may release") and makes it conditional ("depending on the circumstances"). This contradicts the original statement and creates uncertainty about liability for past breaches.

perturbation.original_text:
Article 4.Effectiveness
This Amendment shall only become effective upon the VNBJ Closing with respect to Article 1.1 and the VNBZ Closing with respect to Article 1.2, and shall terminate without any force or effect in the event that the VNBJ SPA and the VNBZ SPA are terminated in accordance with the terms thereof.
perturbation.changed_text:
Article 4.Effectiveness
This Amendment shall become effective at a time determined by Nissin Kogyo Co., Ltd. regardless of the VNBJ Closing with respect to Article 1.1 and the VNBZ Closing with respect to Article 1.2, and shall only terminate at the full discretion of the aforementioned company in the event that the VNBJ SPA and the VNBZ SPA are terminated in accordance with the terms thereof.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states specific conditions for the agreement becoming effective and terminating. The modified version gives Nissin Kogyo Co. Ltd. full control over the amendment's effectiveness and termination completely bypassing the previously agreed upon condition for effectiveness.
